14 bool MoveItCollisionChecker::isValid(const ob::State* state) const
15 {
16  auto&& q = *state->as<ompl::base::ConstrainedStateSpace::StateType>();
17  collision_detection::CollisionResult res;
18  moveit::core::RobotState* robot_state = tss_.getStateStorage();
19  robot_state->setJointGroupPositions(group_name_, q);
20  ps_->checkCollision(collision_request_simple_, res, *robot_state);
21  return !res.collision;
22 }
